page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Children play a variety of games on the school playground and in the street at home. Many games like bull-dog ,bench tigs ,red-rover, hide and seek and talyho are played at school. We found that football is the most popular playground game at our school. Another popular one is chain-tigs . How to play chain-tigs Someone is the catcher. He chases the rest and when he catches one of them he lucks up with them by holding hands and together they chase the others. Each time someone is caught they join hands to make a long chain until everyone is caught. The last to be caught become the catcher .Many different games are played in the street at home like tennis, bad-egg, rounders, street olympics, kick-can and BMX tigs.
